# <code>math abs</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Returns absolute values of a list of numbers</div>

## Signature

```> math abs```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Get absolute of each value in a list of numbers
```shell
  > [-50 -100.0 25] | math abs
```
